about_the_game:
Relumine is a puzzle adventure game. A child delves into an abandoned mine and discovers a magic crystal. With the crystal’s power to rotate the world, she explores the ruins of an ancient society, is chased by a giant shadow and guided by mysterious spirits, in search of her long lost Papa.



♦ Explore 5 mystical portions of the ancient mine, with dozens of puzzles to solve.

♦ Unique Rubik's Cube like mechanic and level design that blends gameplay with storytelling, allowing the player to learn about the world while they play.

♦ Discover magic and unravel the mysteries of the unknown, as Relumine presents an alternate perspective of the world, as seen through a child’s eyes.

reviews:
“Solving Relumine’s curious puzzles takes a shift in perspective. Rotate this strange world to ascend and descend platforms in an abandoned mine filled with curious crystals, mysterious spirits, and a giant shadow in hot pursuit. Stuck? Make sure you’re standing in the right place before you twist!”
App Store

“The weekend is approaching, and for many there is also a little time to relax and play a game from the App Store. Anyone who is enthusiastic about puzzle games and adventures will find a suitable new release in Relumine.”


“Relumine is an inviting game that is easy to play and utterly enchanting in its otherworldliness, helping its player to escape into a soothing world of puzzle's and fun.”
